attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to help end the conflict and attacks in Palestine.
We want the UK to put an end to this and notice the suffering between Israel and Palestine, when lives become a factor it’s not a minor issue.
The government should encourage peace talk, think of ways to help reduce the violence its freedom of speech, Palestine want to be free they should. More emphasis should be taken in these talks, the prime minster should work with other country to encourage these peace talks to reduce the amount of blood shed and loss of life.

No one deserves to die or suffer the way these people are suffering you don’t need to be a Muslim to stand for up this justice you just need to be a HUMAN. They have eyes who have dreams, they have ambitions which they want to be fulfilled.

Most of all they have hearts and so do we let’s do what as “darkness cannot drive out darkness, only light can, hate cannot drive out hate only love can”- martin luther king jr
